product_name: prAna Rena Reversible Bikini Bottoms - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Suit your mood with the prAna Rena Reversible bikini bottoms that switch from print to solid. Classic leg cut and a low rise create a modern silhouette; removable side ties offer optional detail. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Includes prAna Rena Reversible bikini bottoms only. Closeout.
